export default function CoverPreview({ data }) { return (

{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

{data.company}

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am {data.name || "Your Name"}, applying for the position of {data.jobTitle || "Position"} at{" "} {data.company || "Company Name"}.

{data.message || "Your cover letter message..."}

Sincerely,

{data.name || "Your Name"}

); }

export default function CoverPreviewCorporate({ data }) { return (

{data.name}

{data.email}

{data.phone}

{data.address}

{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

{data.company}

Hiring Manager

{data.message}

Sincerely,

{data.name}

); }

export default function CoverPreviewCreative({ data }) { return (

{data.name}

{data.jobTitle}

{data.message}

Warm regards,

{data.name}

); }
